bwwExcerpt: "Director Christopher Ashley (the Broadway veteran's screen credits include 1995's "Jeffrey") dynamically translates the material from stage to streaming; he knows where the closeups need to go, and editors Virginia Katz and Leslie Jones always follow Tobias A. Schliesser's camera to exactly where it needs to be.
